description: Lists the data source connectors that you have created.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index used with one or more data source connectors.

nested_items.name: SummaryItems
nested_items.description: An array of summary information for one or more data source connector.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the data source.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the data source.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the data source.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the data source connector was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the data source connector was last updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the data source. When the status is ACTIVE the data source is ready to use.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The code for a language. This shows a supported language for all documents in the data source. English is supported by default. For more information on supported languages, including their codes, see Adding documents in languages other than English.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Kendra returns this token that you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of data source connectors.
